SELECT w.double_id, w.type, w.title, w.`status`, w.pic_urls, w.content, w.create_by, w.create_time, w.update_by, w.update_time, w.remark, w.receive_user_id, w.send_user_id, w.rate, w.address, w.location, w.phonenumber, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='double_type' AND d.dict_value = w.type )AS doubleTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='double_process_type' AND d.dict_value = t.process_type)as processTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='double_process_type_status' AND d.dict_value = t.status)as statusName FROM feature_double_work_trace t RIGHT JOIN feature_double_work w ON w.double_id = t.double_id WHERE t.receive_user_id= #{receiveUserId} AND t.`status` = 0 GROUP BY w.double_id ORDER BY w.create_time DESC

SELECT CONCAT(CAST(CONVERT(100 * CAST((SELECT COUNT(g.double_id) FROM feature_double_work g WHERE g.`status` IN(3,4)) AS DECIMAL) / CAST(COUNT(double_id) AS DECIMAL), DECIMAL) AS CHAR)) AS collectRate, CONCAT(CAST(CONVERT(100 * CAST((SELECT COUNT(g.double_id) FROM feature_double_work g WHERE g.rate >= 4) AS DECIMAL) / CAST(COUNT(double_id) AS DECIMAL), DECIMAL) AS CHAR)) AS processRate FROM feature_double_work
